about.p1: Hello, I'm Fandi, a Full Stack Web Developer with a passion for creating web experiences that are not only functional, but also stunning. In the front-end world, I have expertise in implementing designs using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and I believe that the use of modern frameworks such as React and Vue brings a new dimension to interactivity and visual appeal.
about.p2: In back-end development, I rely on Express to ensure optimal performance and security. I don't just see web development as a job, but as an opportunity to embrace challenges and continue learning. I believe that innovation comes through the desire to continually grow, and I'm always open to digging deeper into the world of web development.
about.p3: With a combination of technical expertise and a spirit of exploration, I'm ready to take your web project to the next level. Let's create an unforgettable web experience together!
about.service_body1: I offer stunning website design and development services, powered by modern technology.

exp.head: experience
exp.paerte_code: As a UI/UX Designer who focuses on creating application prototype designs for further development. By understanding user needs, I strive to create simple and effective designs. The tool I use is Figma.
exp.balaroa: Create an application to create automatic letters, so that employees only need to enter the required data and letters can be immediately created for community service purposes. using React and Express.

data.title: Responsive Website And Company Profile
